segments.text: Personal Finance Department , Lucie speaking , how may I help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello there . I need some advice about personal finance . Could you help me please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's no problem . What exactly would you like to know ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I've been very busy recently and I'm having trouble keeping up to date with everything , so I just wondered what exact service you offer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have a wonderful new service which provides a wide range of banking services , 24/7 , wherever you are .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds perfect and just what I'm looking for .
segments.speaker: S2
